amendment.description: To create a point of order against any legislation that would provide taxpayer funds to the United Nations while any member nation forces citizens or residents of that nation to undergo involuntary abortions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 702 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 61. Record Vote Number: 86.

action.text: Amendment SA 702 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Cruz.
